name: InspireMe
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Everyone needs a little inspiration. Brilliant Pursuit will be bringing you a daily quote to help inspire your day. Shareable graphics of the quote will be available at www.brilliantpursuit.com/inspireme or www.facebook.com/trudiesbrilliantpursuit
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
